page.title: 04Employment in Yeovil.
page.content: The{number}of people{unemployed}in Yeovil is{3350.}The unemployment rate is{8.5%}compared with the national average of 12%.It is rising slowly. The figure is mainly made up of{ {unskilled younger people. The types of job at present available at the Job Centre include hair-dressing, nursing, hotel and catering, garden centre assistant and a "kiss-a-gram"girl. On average 600 people use the{Job Centre}every week. Manufacturing industry employs the most people with{Westlands Helicopters as the largest employer. Retail services do not offer quite as many jobs; then come clerical workers,the social services,and agriculture. { Youth Training Schemes}have provided permanent employment for 80% of trainees.
